rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. The digit pointed by each arrow must be smaller than the other three digits that the arrow touches.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. The digit pointed by each arrow must be smaller than the other three digits that the arrow touches.
